short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that displays floating bubbles on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bubble Overlay is a fun and lighthearted Chrome extension that adds floating, animated bubbles to any web page. Whether you’re looking to brighten your browsing experience or add a touch of whimsy to your day, this extension is perfect for you.

Features:

Easily toggle bubbles on or off with the extension popup.
Works on all websites—just activate it and enjoy!
Lightweight and easy to use, with no impact on your browser’s performance.
How to Use:

Install the Bubble Overlay extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click on the extension icon in your toolbar.
Toggle the bubbles on or off with the button provided.
Transform your web browsing into a playful and relaxing experience with Bubble Overlay!
